skill.name: Ents go to War
skill.description:
Shakes the earth as if an Ent stamped his foot, damaging and stunning several enemies.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Bard's Arrow
skill.description:
A shot that fears the enemy.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Fear replaced with attack speed debuff.</rgb>

skill.name: Rally!
skill.description: Revives a defeated ally in combat, with their Health and Power mostly intact.

skill.name: Fight On
skill.description: Heals the Champion for a percentage of their health over time.

skill.name: Controlled Burn
skill.description:
Briefly increases damage, Power regen, and attack speed.
Adds 1 Fervour Pip every 5 seconds.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of Victory
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Victory into battle. This banner reduces power costs of those around it.

skill.name: Escape from Darkness
skill.description: Revives a defeated ally (in-combat).

skill.name: Rallying Cry
skill.description:
Boosts Morale of nearby Fellows.
This skill is more potent when used with a Defeat Event.

skill.name: Routing Cry
skill.description:
Deals Light damage to nearby foes.
This skill is more potent when used with a Defeat Event.

skill.name: Battle-shout
skill.description: An attack that triggers a Battle-readied State, enabling you to deal more damage.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of War
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of War into battle. This banner increases the damage dealt by those around it.

skill.name: Muster Courage
skill.description: Removes Poison, Disease, Wound or Fear effects from nearby allies.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of Hope
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Hope into battle. This banner increases the mitigations of those around it.

skill.name: Devastating Blow
skill.description:
Requires Battle-readied State.
Normal attacks enable the Battle-hardened state, boosting healing and defences.
Critical attacks deal devastating bonus damage and trigger a Defeat Response.

skill.name: Swift Strike
skill.description: A swift melee attack.

skill.name: Battle Frenzy
skill.description: Your Fervour is instantly increased as well as some additional fervour over time.

skill.name: Sting
skill.description: A quick stinging blow.

skill.name: Shield-swipe
skill.description:
Attack with both weapon and shield.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a block response.</rgb>

skill.name: Guardian's Ward
skill.description: Strengthens defences briefly.

skill.name: Shield-blow
skill.description: A strike with your shield that will open a block response.

skill.name: Catch a Breath
skill.description:
After blocking or parrying an attack, you are able to restore morale and power.
Using this skill will remove any active block and parry responses.

skill.name: Vexing Blow
skill.description: A quick swipe that will strike multiple enemies.

skill.name: Challenge
skill.description: Draws enemy threat away from your allies.

skill.name: Protection
skill.description: Improve your ally's defences. Enables you to react to attacks made against this ally if within 10m.

skill.name: Protection by the Sword
skill.description: Boosts melee damage of Fellowship. Enables you to react to an attack parried by an ally if within 10m.

skill.name: Warrior's Heart
skill.description: Briefly boosts max Morale.

skill.name: Thrill of Danger
skill.description: Regenerates Power, increasing with every enemy near you. (This skill works in combat only.)

skill.name: Set Trap
skill.description:
Places a trap to root the enemy.
Trap remains for 60 seconds after being placed.

skill.name: Intent Concentration
skill.description: In a desperate time, instantly reach full Focus.

skill.name: Beneath Notice
skill.description: Reduces threat.

skill.name: Staff-strike
skill.description: Strikes hard with the staff. If your pet is flanking the enemy, you will deal bonus damage.

skill.name: Power of Knowledge
skill.description: Lightning wreaths your enemy while restoring your own power.

skill.name: Light of Hope
skill.description: Transfers Morale to an ally or companion.

skill.name: Knowledge of Cures
skill.category: Cures of the House of Healing:
skill.description: Cleanse multiple wounds, diseases, poisons, or fears from an ally.

skill.name: Cracked Earth
skill.description:
Unstable earth deals Fire damage to several enemies, eventually rooting them in place.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Root replaced with a mount acceleration debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Wisdom of the Council
skill.description:
Heals Morale in a time of need.
Briefly protects you, while damaging enemies who attack you.

skill.name: Blinding Flash
skill.description:
A flash instantly dazes the enemy, but damage will break its stupor.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Share the Power
skill.description: Transfers Power to an ally or companion.

skill.name: Song of Aid
skill.description:
Inspires Fellows to perform heroic feats.
Beorning: Reduces Call to Wild, Thickened Hide, and Nature's Bond cooldowns.
Burglar: Gains a Critical Response.
Captain: Gains an Enemy Defeat Response.
Champion: Gains an Enemy Defeat Response.
Guardian: Gains a Block Response and a Parry Response.
Hunter: Gains the ability to use Improved Focus in-combat.
Lore-master: Beacon of Hope has a decreased Cooldown and Morale cost.
Minstrel: Unlocks Bolster Courage for free and gain bonus Tactical Damage.
Rune-keeper: Scribe's Spark and Prelude to Hope have decreased Cooldowns.
Warden: Shield Piercer has a decreased Cooldown.

skill.name: Minor Ballad
skill.description:
Boosts Tactical damage and harms your foe.
Ballads unlock Anthems and Codas.

skill.name: Enlivening Grace
skill.description: Revives a defeated ally.

skill.name: Cry of the Chorus (Melody)
skill.description: This skill provides you with three healing ballad bonus effects allowing access to Anthems and Codas. It also breaks any silence effects on you.

skill.name: Subtle Stab
skill.description: A quick, sharp attack against your foe.

skill.name: Riddle
skill.description:
Daze the enemy briefly, waking the foe when damage is dealt.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Aim
skill.description:
Careful aim results in a Critical Hit and reduced miss chance on the next damaging attack.
Using this skill will not break Stealth.
This skill guarantees a Critical Response

skill.name: Diversion
skill.description:
Divert the enemy's attention briefly from yourself while in Stealth.
Does not break Stealth.

skill.name: Hide in Plain Sight
skill.description:
Disappear from before the enemy's eyes.
Briefly improves Stealth. Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Sneak
skill.description:
Move about unseen while Sneaking.
There is a chance enemies will detect you, especially when you move in front of them.

skill.name: Trick: Enrage
skill.description:
Cause the enemy to take more damage.
Limit: One Trick per target.

skill.name: Track Crops
skill.description: When active, nearby crops are displayed on the radar.

skill.name: Wild Attack
skill.description: A single powerful melee attack.

skill.name: Blade Wall
skill.description: Makes a frontal AoE attack.

skill.name: Savage Strikes
skill.description: Makes a savage double attack.

skill.name: Exchange of Blows
skill.description: You reflect damage to your attacker when hit.

skill.name: Bracing Attack
skill.description: You make an attack which allows you to brace yourself against counterattack, increasing your Morale by a small amount.

skill.name: Champion's Challenge
skill.description: Your taunting cry forces your target to face and attack you for a few seconds.

skill.name: Merciful Strike
skill.description: A powerful attack that can only be used on opponents under 20% health.

skill.name: Sprint
skill.description:
Increases movement speed.
Grants immunity to movement speed debuffs.

skill.name: Clobber
skill.description: Makes a swift melee attack, interrupting any induction skills being attempted by the enemy.

skill.name: Horn of Gondor
skill.description:
Makes a full AoE attack, which stuns your opponents.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Hamstring
skill.description: Makes an attack which snares your opponent.

skill.name: Stallion's Spirit
skill.description: This fellowship skill replenishes your power and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Ent's Strength (Melee)
skill.description: This fellowship skill does direct melee damage to your target and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Eagle's Cry
skill.description: This fellowship skill replenishes your morale and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Spider's Guile (Melee)
skill.description: This fellowship skill does minor direct melee damage to your target, then more damage over time and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Let Fly
skill.description: You attack with your ranged weapon.

skill.name: Boast
skill.description: Tales of your heroic acts draw cheers from the crowd.

skill.name: Cutting Attack
skill.description: A bleed that deals damage-over-time.

skill.name: Make Haste
skill.description: Increases the movement speed of the Fellowship.

skill.name: Pressing Attack
skill.description:
Requires Battle-readied State.
A small AoE double-strike inflicting medium damage.
A Critical hit on the second blow triggers a Defeat Response and enables the Battle-hardened state.

skill.name: Words of Courage
skill.description: Casts a Heal-over-time upon an ally.

skill.name: Motivating Speech
skill.description: Boosts Morale of nearby allies.

skill.name: Last Stand
skill.description: You are able to resist succumbing to defeat for a short time.

skill.name: Command Respect
skill.description: Your presence commands respect from those around you.

skill.name: Raise the Spirit
skill.description: Quickly heals Morale of an ally or yourself.

skill.name: Major Ballad
skill.description:
Heals yourself and nearby targets while boosting your healing capability.
Ballads unlock Anthems and Codas.
<rgb=#00ffDD>While in Resonance and Dissonance this skill will deal damage to a target instead of healing.</rgb>

skill.name: Piercing Cry
skill.description: Your shout does light damage to your enemies and can interrupt their actions.

skill.name: Perfect Ballad
skill.description:
Reduces Power costs and harms your foe.
Ballads unlock Anthems and Codas.

skill.name: Anthem of Prowess
skill.description:
Anthem: Increases Armour, Evade and Attack speed of all fellowship members.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 3 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ff00>Alters Coda: Coda will cause your next three Hero's/Herald's/Dissonant Strikes to have no cooldown.</rgb>

skill.name: Anthem of Composure
skill.description:
Anthem: Increases Resistances and Tactical Mitigation of all fellowship members.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 3 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ff00>Alters Coda: Coda applies a short-term power-over-time restoring effect to the caster.</rgb>

skill.name: Inspire Fellows
skill.description:
Heals the Morale of the Fellowship.
This skill is not usable in Dissonance.

skill.name: Invocation of Elbereth
skill.description:
Calling upon the Valar can send certain evil foes fleeing in terror for a short time.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Fear replaced with attack speed debuff.</rgb>

skill.name: Bolster Courage
skill.description: Significantly heals Morale of an ally or yourself.

skill.name: Story of Courage
skill.description:
Removes Fears, Diseases, Poisons, and Wounds from your allies.
Protects against further Fears.

skill.name: Song of Distraction
skill.description: A song that can make your enemy become drowsy and not detect players until they are much closer than normal. This does not work against monsters already engaged in combat.

skill.name: Still As Death
skill.description: You are talented at feigning death, causing enemies to ignore you completely.

skill.name: Story of the Hammerhand
skill.description:
A story so potent that it provides you with a shield of morale that must be destroyed before you will begin losing morale again. The name comes from the adage that those who know this story were said to have been able to take a blow from Helm Hammerhand himself.
Bubble strength is 10% of the target's Max Morale pool before other bonuses apply.

skill.name: Burning Embers
skill.description: Burn the enemy with damage-over-time, slowing movement.

skill.name: Raven-lore
skill.description:
Summons a raven companion.
The raven specializes in buffing and debuffing.

skill.name: Inner Flame
skill.description:
Use Power to heal Morale for both yourself and your companion. Inner Flame tiers up a Fire damage buff as it channels, up to a cap.
Must have a companion summoned.

skill.name: Gust of Wind
skill.description:
Tearing winds cause frost damage to enemies.
<rgb=#2C86FF>This skill has a chance to whip Burning Embers into Searing Embers, while spreading the effect to nearby foes.</rgb>

skill.name: Friend of Bears
skill.description:
Summons a bear companion.
Bears are tough companions which can draw the ire of the enemy.

skill.name: Sign of Power: Command
skill.description: Slows enemy attack speed and reduces Parry chance.

skill.name: Sign of Power: Righteousness
skill.description: Renders an ally immune to stuns, dazes, and other combat states for 20s. This duration cannot be increased by any source.

skill.name: Sign of Power: Vigilance
skill.description: Allows you to better see hidden enemies.

skill.name: Fire-lore
skill.description: Debuffs enemies' physical attack damage.

skill.name: Wind-lore
skill.description: Increases enemies' incoming damage.

skill.name: Herb-lore
skill.description:
Roots several enemies in place.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Root replaced with a mount acceleration debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Call to the Valar
skill.description: You call upon the wisdom of the Valar, recovering some of your skills and providing a temporary immunity to induction set back from damage.

skill.name: Light of the Rising Dawn
skill.description:
Damages and stuns the enemy.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Sweeping Cut
skill.description: A sweeping back-and forth strike in a frontal arc.

skill.name: Retaliation
skill.description:
A retaliation after parrying an attack.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a parry response.</rgb>

skill.name: Bash
skill.description:
Bash with your shield to stun the target. This skill has a higher chance to perform a critical hit.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires the use of Shield-swipe.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Whirling Retaliation
skill.description:
Whirl to attack enemies in a circle.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a parry response.</rgb>

skill.name: Stamp
skill.description: Interrupts the target.

skill.name: Turn the Tables
skill.description: When dazed, stunned, or knocked down: recover from impairing effects and inflict them upon your enemy instead.

skill.name: Guardian's Promise
skill.description: Makes a whistle to give to a friend, for summoning you to their side.

skill.name: Surprise Strike
skill.description:
Strike the enemy, dealing more damage from behind or when Stealthed.
Critical hits with Surprise Strike are more damaging than most skills.

skill.name: Cunning Attack
skill.description:
Deals damage even after the initial strike.
The bleed deals more damage while Stealthed.

skill.name: Provoke
skill.description:
Deals slight damage and grants you the Provacateur buff, greatly reducing damage from the next hit you take and improves your crit chance by 20% on your next attack.
Does more damage if used from in Stealth.

skill.name: Double-edged Strike
skill.description:
A Critical hit enables the Burglar to strike with both weapons.
<rgb=#FFFF00>Dual-wielding required.</rgb>

skill.name: Exploit Opening
skill.description: Stun an enemy to enable a Fellowship Manoeuvre for your group.

skill.name: Addle
skill.description: Causes the enemy to fail skill attempts, and subsequent skill attempts will briefly take longer to execute.

skill.name: Reveal Weakness
skill.description:
Weaken enemy defences, increasing damage taken from attacks.
Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Ready and Able
skill.description:
Resets the recovery timers on several skills.
Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Touch and Go
skill.description:
Heal yourself and improve your defences.
Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Find Footing
skill.description:
Quickly recover from being dazed, stunned, or knocked down.
Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Track Treasure
skill.description: Tracks treasure chests and valuable containers.

skill.name: Burgle
skill.description: While stealthed, you may attempt to lighten the pockets of unsuspecting targets.

skill.name: Cure Poison
skill.description: Cures poison on an ally.

skill.name: Quick Shot
skill.description: Nock and loose an arrow quickly.

skill.name: Barbed Arrow
skill.description: Your arrow can cause a wound that bleeds and slightly slows movement speed.

skill.name: Swift Bow
skill.description: Loose two missiles in rapid succession.

skill.name: Penetrating Shot
skill.description: A damaging shot that pierces enemy mitigations.

skill.name: Merciful Shot
skill.description:
A massively damaging shot that unlocks when the target is below 50% health.
Critical hits deal bonus damage.

skill.name: Low Cut
skill.description: A low cut in front of you which briefly slows the movement speed of up to 2 enemies.

skill.name: Blindside
skill.description: A melee strike immediately followed by a close-range bow attack.

skill.name: Find the Path
skill.description:
Increases your movement speed, also affecting nearby allies.
Movement speed only increased while out of combat.

skill.name: Purge Poison
skill.description: Purges poisons from an ally or yourself.

skill.name: Bright Campfire
skill.description:
Build a campfire to quicken allies' recovery.
Enables some crafting skills.
Campfire lasts for 3 minutes.

skill.name: Desperate Flight
skill.description: Escape from danger and travel to a nearby rally point.

skill.name: Guide to Thorin's Hall
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Thorin's Hall.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Guide to Bree
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Bree.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Guide to Esteldín
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Esteldín.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Guide to Rivendell
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Rivendell.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Passage of Nature
skill.description: Allows you to track the presence of nearby beasts and other natural creatures.

skill.name: Passage of Foes
skill.description: Allows you to track the presence of nearby Orcs, trolls, giants, and evil Men or dwarves.

skill.name: Passage of Shadow
skill.description: Allows you to track the presence of the dead, the unseen, and ancient evil.

skill.name: Camouflage
skill.description: Enter Stealth while remaining still.

skill.name: Ent's Strength (Ranged)
skill.description: This fellowship skill does direct ranged damage to your target and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Spider's Guile (Ranged)
skill.description: This fellowship skill does minor direct ranged damage to your target, then more damage over time and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Focus
skill.description:
Before combat, rapidly increase your Focus.
Focus is required to use some bow skills and is lost if you move.

skill.name: Stance: Precision
skill.description:
When active, generates Focus every 5 seconds.
Quick Shot has increased Critical Chance.
Upon activation, grants a finesse buff for a short duration.

skill.name: Stance: Strength
skill.description:
When active, increases damage of shots.
Quick Shot slows enemy movement speed.

skill.name: Stance: Endurance
skill.description:
When active, decreases the Power cost of Ranged attacks and increases your Parry and Evade ratings.
Quick Shot returns morale.
Upon activation, grants an Evade chance bonus.

skill.name: Throw Stone
skill.description: This grants you a short ranged attack.

skill.name: Return to the Shire
skill.description: Your skill as a hobbit allows you to find a path back to The Shire. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Hobbit-resilience
skill.description: You can raise your Fellowship's Hope value through good old-fashioned hobbit-cheer. This does not stack with other Hope buffs.

skill.name: Hobbit-stealth
skill.description: Although untrained, you have the natural ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.

skill.name: Hobbit-silence
skill.description: You can lie prone in complete silence, causing enemies to ignore you.

skill.name: Upper-cut
skill.description: You make a stiff punch at your enemy.

skill.name: Return to Bree
skill.description: This enables you to quickly return to Bree. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Duty-bound
skill.description: You provide a bonus to your Fellowship's Morale.

skill.name: Strength of Morale
skill.description: In combat, the Race of Man is known for its unquenchable spirit. This skill restores lost morale.

skill.name: Silvan Shadows
skill.description: Although untrained, you have the natural ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.

skill.name: Return to Rivendell
skill.description: This enables you to quickly return to Rivendell. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Eldar's Grace
skill.description: With the speed and grace of the Eldar, you can put up a strong parry defence.

skill.name: Power of the Eldar
skill.description: You provide a bonus to your Fellowship's Power.

skill.name: Head-butt
skill.description: Allows you to smash an enemy with your head for damage.

skill.name: Return to Thorin's Gate
skill.description: This enables you to quickly return to Thorin's Gate. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Endurance of Stone
skill.description: For a short amount of time, you can withstand blows that would batter a weaker race's Morale into dust.

skill.name: Dwarf-endurance
skill.description: You provide a bonus to your Fellowship's Vitality.

skill.name: Fellowship's Heart
skill.description: Provides a Heal-over-time to the Fellowship and removes Fear effects.

skill.name: Inspire (Shield-brother)
skill.description: A melee attack that heals the Morale and Power of your Shield-brother.

skill.name: Return to Camp
skill.description:
Binds you to one of many camp sites scattered across the world.
Binding enables you to return to the campsite with ease.

skill.name: Guide to Michel Delving
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Michel Delving in the Shire.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Heart Seeker
skill.description: A shot that cannot be missed, parried, evaded, or blocked.

skill.name: To Arms (Shield-brother)
skill.description: Briefly increases the defence of your Shield-brother.

skill.name: Kick
skill.description: A melee attack that interrupts enemy inductions.

skill.name: Withdraw
skill.description: Breaks the effects of Dazes, Stuns and Knockdowns.

skill.name: Time of Need
skill.description:
You gain a surge of energy for a short time.
Puts the Captain in a Battle-readied State.
Increases your damage output for a short time.

skill.name: Blade of Elendil
skill.description:
Requires Battle-hardened State.
Deal an attack with an increased Crit chance.
Fellows within range gain the Light of Elendil, enabling them to deal additional Light damage.

skill.name: Bane Flare
skill.description: A flare in the sky dazes the enemy, but damage will break its stupor.

skill.name: Warding Knowledge
skill.description: Creates a circle in which enemies are vulnerable to tactical damage and more likely to miss.

skill.name: Ancient Craft
skill.description:
Debuffs enemies' armour value with a handful of thrown metal.
If the Ancient Craft trait is at third rank or higher, enemies will take extra damage from Lightning skills.

skill.name: Sticky Tar
skill.description:
Smashes a phial of sticky tar onto the ground.
Slows movement speed of enemies who run through tar, and makes them vulnerable to fire.
Tar remains for 1 minute.

skill.name: Storm-lore
skill.description:
A thunder-clap stuns surrounding enemies briefly, inflicting weak damage.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: The Melody of Battle
skill.description:
This melody inspires you or your target to better know the fluid nature of battle, providing them swift blades and manoeuvres that dishearten their foes.
<rgb=#00FFDD>This skill is only available in Resonance.</rgb>

skill.name: Dissonance - Stance
skill.description:
Your charismatic speech drives fear into the hearts of your enemies.
<rgb=#FF7700>You lose access to all fellowship heals and all normal heals become Self-only.
Echoes of Battle becomes Timeless Echoes of Battle.
Major Ballad becomes an offensive Ballad.
Coda of Vigour becomes Coda of Fury.</rgb>
Only one Stance may be active at a time.

skill.name: Call of the Second Age
skill.description:
Deals a burst of AoE Light damage to nearby foes.
Boosts movement speed of nearby allies.

skill.name: Gift of the Hammerhand
skill.description:
Grants a Morale bubble to a Fellowship member.
Bubble strength is 10% of the target's Max Morale pool before other bonuses apply.

skill.name: Lynx-speech
skill.description:
Summons a lynx companion.
The lynx is a stealthy hunter.

skill.name: Chord of Salvation
skill.description: Instantly heals an ally's Morale.

skill.name: Irresistible Melody
skill.description: You perform a melody so irresistible that all Free Peoples who hear it cannot help but dance.

skill.name: Scribe Stance
skill.description: When you enter Scribe Stance, you change your Mentor skills into Scribe Manual skills, allowing you to create manuals to teach instruments. Scribing manuals is much more taxing than teaching in person, requires a Blank Mentor Manual, and will apply a 10 day cooldown to all Mentor skills.

skill.name: Back from the Brink
skill.description:
Revives a defeated ally.
(Can only be used out of combat.)

skill.name: Knowledge of the Lore-master
skill.description:
Examines the weaknesses and strengths of certain creatures.
Reduces enemy Resistances if out of combat when used.

skill.name: Mentor : Clarinet
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the clarinet.

skill.name: Mentor : Cowbell
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the cowbell.

skill.name: Mentor : Horn
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the horn.

skill.name: Contact Pedlar
skill.description: At campsites, call a Pedlar to whom you and others may sell items.

skill.name: Practical Joke
skill.description: Whose fault is it if the mightiest of heroes cannot take a joke?

skill.name: Share The Fun
skill.description: Share Stealth with one ally while remaining within 5m of one another.

skill.name: Second Wind
skill.description: Consumes all current fervour and restores power. Amount of power restored is based off the amount of fervour consumed.

skill.name: Shield Wall
skill.description: Protects an ally by intercepting all incoming damage.

skill.name: Force Opening
skill.description: An attack that will open a parry response.

skill.name: Engage
skill.description: Draws enemy threat, making you the target's most threatening opponent.

skill.name: Stagger
skill.description: An attack that impairs the target on a critical hit, or when attacking from behind.

skill.name: Fray the Edge
skill.description:
Taunts the enemy into lowering its defences, increasing the chance of a Fellowship Manoeuvre.
Fellowship Manoeuvre chance increases with each use.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description: Charge with a burst of speed. Grants immunity to slowing effects.

skill.name: Self-motivation
skill.description: Restores Power.

skill.name: Quick Thrust
skill.description: A fast melee attack.

skill.name: Fiery Ridicule
skill.description:
Stacking fire damage-over-time.
Increases +1% Damage per Battle attunement.

skill.name: Smouldering Wrath
skill.description:
A channelled skill dealing huge amounts of fire damage every second.
Duration increases per battle attunement.
This skill consumes 1 attunement per second.
Requires Battle Attunement.

skill.name: Deft Strike
skill.description: A powerful blow.

skill.name: Shield-bash
skill.description: Quick strike with a shield.

skill.name: Nothing Truly Ends
skill.description: Revives a defeated ally.

skill.name: Flurry of Words
skill.description: A flurry of chilling words unleashes a swirl of numbing cold on foes around you. An area around you is filled with a flurry of frost, and dealing damage over time.

skill.name: Essence of Winter
skill.description: In writing, the significance of winter is that in time all things must slow, then stop. Lowers your foes' incoming healing and increases their skill Power cost.

skill.name: Chilling Rhetoric
skill.description: Written words can have a chilling effect on their victim. Slows your foe, but damaging the foe will return its speed.

skill.name: Safeguard
skill.description:
Damages the enemy while increasing block chance and healing the Warden.
Second in the Persevere Gambit Chain. Finishing the Chain will enhance Persevere finishing skills.

skill.name: Persevere
skill.description:
Damages the enemy while increasing block chance and healing the Warden.
First in the Persevere Gambit Chain.

skill.name: Rousing Words
skill.description:
A channelled skill that heals Morale with every second.
+2 to Healing attunement.
This skill generates no threat. Allies affected for at least 5 seconds will gain a tier of Writ of Health.

skill.name: Epic for the Ages
skill.description:
A big heal.
+Healing per attunement.
Requires Healing Attunement.

skill.name: Word of Exaltation
skill.description:
Applies a bubble that briefly increases Morale.
+Bubble potency per attunement consumed.
Requires Healing Attunement.

skill.name: Mending Verse
skill.description: Hardships are forgotten and spirits are lifted by such writings. This heal over time stacks with itself. -1% Power cost per Healing Attunement.

skill.name: Prelude to Hope
skill.description: Heals the target +2% per Healing attunement.

skill.name: Essence of Storm
skill.description:
A lightning attack increasing +3% Critical Chance per Battle attunement.
Deals +100% damage on critical hits.

skill.name: Ceaseless Argument
skill.description: A quick lightning attack, hard to resist.

skill.name: Scribe's Spark
skill.description: A lightning attack dealing +2% damage per Battle attunement.

skill.name: Shocking Words
skill.description:
A lightning attack dealing +Damage and +Stun duration per attunement consumed.
Requires Battle Attunement.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Epic Conclusion
skill.description:
An enormously powerful lightning attack dealing +Damage per attunement consumed.
Requires Battle Attunement.

skill.name: Ambush
skill.description:
When given time to prepare, a Warden can deliver a powerful opening volley.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Knockout replaced with a mount turn rate debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Warden's Taunt
skill.description: A shout which deals Light Damage over time.

skill.name: Writ of Fire
skill.description:
Stacking fire damage-over-time.
May be applied up to three times, increasing the Writ's tier.
+20% damage per tier increase.

skill.name: Sting
skill.description: A quick stinging blow.

skill.name: Do Not Fall This Day
skill.description: Places an effect on an ally that revives them on defeat. Only useable on a fellowship or raid member.

skill.name: Improved Cry of the Chorus (Melody)
skill.description: This skill provides you with three healing ballad bonus effects allowing access to Anthems and Codas. It also breaks any silence effects on you and provides you with a short term immunity to silence.

skill.name: Shocking Touch
skill.description:
Briefly dazes the foe.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Friend of Feline Hunters
skill.description:
Summons a sabre-tooth cat companion.
The sabre-tooth cat hails from the north and can wield the cold of its home.

skill.name: Friend of Nature
skill.description:
Summons a Bog-guardian companion.
The Bog-guardian excels at dealing damage from range.

skill.name: Adamant
skill.description: Champions shrug off damage that would bring many to their knees.

skill.name: Blood Rage
skill.description: Breaks Champion out of any impairing Combat State and removes disarm effects.

skill.name: Sticky Gourd
skill.description: Smashes the foe with burning pitch, dealing fire damage.

skill.name: Dispel Corruption
skill.description: Removes Corruptions from the foe.

skill.name: Wizard's Fire
skill.description:
A basic sigil which burns your foe.
If this skill is used whilst your companion flanks the enemy, your Morale will be healed.

skill.name: Sign of Power: See All Ends
skill.description: Reduces an enemy's ability to score a Critical hit.

skill.name: Distracting Shot
skill.description:
A shot that dazes the target.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: A Small Snag
skill.description:
Activated by Double-edged Strike, you attack the enemy's foot, rooting them to the spot and weakening their defences.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Root replaced with a mount acceleration debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Call to Arms: Archer
skill.description: You enlist an Archer to assist you in battle.

skill.name: Critical Strike
skill.description: Ambush victims and other dazed opponents are vulnerable to a Critical Strike.

skill.name: Defensive Strike
skill.description: A weak shield attack which increases your Block rating.

skill.name: Forced March
skill.description:
Boosts non-combat movement speed.
This skill deactivates when entering combat.

skill.name: Goad
skill.description: Goads nearby targets to attack the Warden, dealing Light Damage over time.

skill.name: Impressive Flourish
skill.description:
Deals Light Damage over time to the enemy and boosts defences.
First in the Impressive Flourish Gambit Chain.

skill.name: Offensive Strike
skill.description: A double attack.

skill.name: War-cry
skill.description:
A shout dealing Light Damage that grants an evade bonus to the Warden.
First in the War-cry Gambit Chain.

skill.name: Precise Blow
skill.description: An attack that draws the enemy's attention.

skill.name: Maddening Strike
skill.description:
A quick and well-placed attack.
Second in the Impressive Flourish Gambit Chain.
Finishing the Chain will enhance Impressive Flourish finishing skills.

skill.name: Power Attack
skill.description: A powerful damage over time blow. Renders the target vulnerable to Mighty Blow.

skill.name: Piercing Strike
skill.description: A piercing attack.

skill.name: Brink of Victory
skill.description:
A potent attack dealing Light Damage and grants an evade bonus to the Warden.
Second in the War-cry Gambit Chain. Finishing the Chain will enhance War-cry finishing skills.

skill.name: Onslaught
skill.description: Multiple fast attacks that can interrupt inductions.

skill.name: Combination Strike
skill.description: A dual weapon strike.

skill.name: Fierce Resolve
skill.description: Drains morale from the target to heal the Warden.

skill.name: Mighty Blow
skill.description: A mighty blow that is very difficult to parry or evade. Renders the target vulnerable to Unerring Strike.

skill.name: Boar's Rush
skill.description: A fast charge which has a chance to daze on a critical hit.

skill.name: Wall of Steel
skill.description: A weaving pattern of weapon attacks.

skill.name: Shield Mastery
skill.description: Boosts block and evade rating.

skill.name: Resolution
skill.description: Drains morale from multiple targets within close range, healing the Warden.

skill.name: Spear of Virtue
skill.description: A stabbing attack that dismays the foe.

skill.name: Muster in Ost Guruth
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to Ost Guruth in the Lone-lands.

skill.name: Muster in Evendim
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to Tinnudir in Evendim.

skill.name: Muster in Rivendell
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to Rivendell in the Trollshaws.

skill.name: Muster in Esteldín
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to Esteldín in the North Downs.

skill.name: Wages of Fear
skill.description:
Turning your back on a Warden with javelin at hand is likely to be the last thing you do.
This skill deals extra damage when used from behind.

skill.name: Hampering Javelin
skill.description: Javelins can pierce body parts or equipment and slow the target until the javelin can be removed.

skill.name: Careful Step
skill.description:
Move in stealth briefly.
Facilitates ability to Ambush.

skill.name: Spear and Fist
skill.description: Mastery over the Spear: Allows the Warden to perform Spear Gambits quickly.

skill.name: Spear and Shield
skill.description: Mastery over the Spear: Allows the Warden to perform Spear Gambits quickly.

skill.name: Fist and Spear
skill.description: Mastery over the Fist: Allows Warden to perform Fist Gambits quickly.

skill.name: Shield and Fist

skill.name: Fist and Shield
skill.description: Mastery over the Fist: Allows Warden to perform Fist Gambits quickly.

skill.name: Shield and Spear
skill.description: Mastery over the Shield: Allows Warden to perform Shield Gambits quickly.

skill.name: The Dark Before Dawn
skill.description: A Gambit which restores Power and grants some Power over time.

skill.name: Exultation of Battle
skill.description: Drains health from the target to heal the Warden.

skill.name: Improved Swift Bow
skill.description: Loose three missiles in rapid succession.

skill.name: Improved Merciful Shot
skill.description: A massively damaging shot that unlocks when the target is below 50% health, removing Corruptions.

skill.name: Improved Hide in Plain Sight
skill.description:
Disappear from before the enemy's eyes.
The Burglar can also ignore slowing effects and move at normal runspeed.
Briefly improves Stealth. Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: The Boot
skill.description: A powerful kick which interrupts inductions.

skill.name: Gambit Default
skill.description:
This skill updates to the correct Gambit as icons are added to the Gambit display.
If no Gambit matches the current display, this skill will do a minor melee attack and clear the display.

skill.name: Quick Recovery
skill.description:
Allows Gambit change mid-stroke.
This skill removes the last Gambit from the Gambit Panel.

skill.name: Recovery
skill.description:
Even Wardens can make mistakes.
This skill resets the Gambit Panel.

skill.name: Adroit Manoeuvre
skill.description: A hit that lets the Warden attack more quickly for a time.

skill.name: Reversal
skill.description: An attack which removes one corruption from the enemy.

skill.name: Warden's Triumph
skill.description: A triumphant blow, allowing the Warden to deal even more damage in close combat.

skill.name: Improved Blade of Elendil
skill.description:
Requires Battle-hardened State.
Deal an attack with an increased Crit chance, and also remove Corruption.
Fellows within range gain the Light of Elendil, enabling them to deal additional Light damage.

skill.name: Final Word
skill.description: Interrupts inductions being performed by the foe.

skill.name: Steady Hands
skill.description:
Refocuses attunement from one extreme to the other.
After use, skills cost no Power for 15s.
Requires either Battle or Healing Attunement.

skill.name: Distracting Flame
skill.description: Fire damage-over-time that reduces threat.

skill.name: Spider's Guile (Tactical)
skill.description: This fellowship skill does minor direct tactical damage to your target, then more damage over time and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Ent's Strength (Tactical)
skill.description: This fellowship skill does direct tactical damage to your target and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Improved Final Word
skill.description: Interrupts inductions being performed by the foe and removes Corruptions.

skill.name: Yum! No wonder mobs eat this...
Springfest Horse
skill.description: A horse from the Spring Festival.

skill.name: Prized Tame Redhorn-goat
skill.description: The Iron Garrison Miners have been training Redhorn mountain-goats to use as mounts. These sure-footed creatures can traverse the rocky passageways of Moria where no horse could go. This is one of their tame goats, making it not as fast as others.

skill.name: Prized Tame Redhorn-goat
skill.description: The Iron Garrison Miners have been training Redhorn mountain-goats to use as mounts. These sure-footed creatures can traverse the rocky passageways of Moria where no horse could go. This is one of their tame goats, making it not as fast as others.

skill.name: Prized Nimble Redhorn-goat
skill.description: As a great ally of the Iron Garrison Miners, one can expect access to their most well-trained and quickest goats. This goat can move as fast as most horses.

skill.description: A pony from the Yule Festival.

Breaks the effects of Dazes, Stuns and Knockdowns.
Briefly increases Parry rating.

skill.description: Thanks to your friendship with the Eglain people in the Lone-lands, you are able to quickly return to their homestead at Ost Guruth.

skill.description: Restores the power of your Fellows and grants other bonuses based on your Trait Specialization.

Air continually swirls around your target ally, inflicting damage on any who strike it.
Cannot be used on self.

skill.name: Improved Beneath Notice
skill.description: Reduces threat and restores Power-over-time.

skill.name: Song of the Hammerhand
skill.description:
A Song so potent that it provides you with a shield of morale that must be destroyed before you will begin losing morale again. The name comes from the adage that those who know this song were said to have been able to take a blow from Helm Hammerhand himself.
Bubble strength is 10% of the target's Max Morale pool before other bonuses apply.

skill.name: Unerring Strike
skill.description: A mighty blow that is very difficult to block, parry or evade. Deals bonus damage if the target was recently hit with Mighty Blow.

skill.name: Sure Strike

skill.name: Ignore the Pain

skill.name: Pale Golden Summer Pony
skill.description: A pony from the Summer Festival.

<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Riddle
skill.description:
Daze the enemy briefly, waking the foe when damage is dealt.
Does not break Stealth.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Spear and Spear
skill.description: Mastery over the Spear: Allows the Warden to perform Spear Gambits quickly.

skill.name: Shield and Shield

skill.name: Fist and Fist
skill.description: Mastery over the Fist: Allows Warden to perform Fist Gambits quickly.

skill.name: Battle Memory I
skill.description:
This allows a Warden to store a gambit for later, letting them use it without having to build it.
<rgb=#00FFDD>This skill requires the Potency effect. Potency is triggered by the improved versions of Defensive Strike, Deft Strike and Goad. Once potent, the next Gambit used will replace Battle Memory.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>Potency is consumed and replaced by a potent version of your next successfully executed Gambit.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Cost: % of Max Morale Equal to the Number of Icons used to build Gambit</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Sign of Power: Command
skill.description: Slows enemy attack speed and reduces Parry chance.

skill.name: Improved Staff-sweep
skill.description:
Sweeps the staff to strike surrounding foes.
For each enemy hit, you receive a buff to Crit Chance for your next Fire Skill.
Restores Power-over-time if a companion flanks the enemy.

skill.name: Improved Burning Embers
skill.description:
Burn the enemy with damage-over-time, slowing movement.
The damage-over-time can now stack up to three times on a single target.

skill.name: Shield Tactics
skill.description:
Briefly raise your shield to increase defences.
<rgb=#00FFDD>This Gambit grants immunity to stuns.</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Sure Strike
skill.description:
A melee attack that cannot be blocked or parried.
Reduces the active cooldown of Battle-shout.

skill.name: Grave Wound
skill.description:
A powerful strike that damages your foe.
Deals damage-over-time to the target.

skill.name: Improved Cutting Attack
skill.description: A bleed that deals damage-over-time and slows movement speed.

skill.name: Coda of Melody
skill.description:
A Finishing Skill that deals enormous AoE damage to foes and AoE healing to allies.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 3 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb> <rgb=#00FFDD>Active Anthems add enhanced effects to the Coda.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Ballads from the Minstrel.</rgb>

skill.name: Resonance - Stance
skill.description:
A healing stance, wherein the Minstrel's restorative abilities are at their finest.<rgb=#FF7700>
Major Ballad becomes a healing Ballad.
Echoes of Battle Becomes The Melody of Battle.
Coda of Melody becomes Coda of Resonance.</rgb>
Only one Stance may be active at a time.

skill.name: Improved Penetrating Shot
skill.description: A damaging shot that pierces enemy mitigations.

skill.name: Improved Focus
skill.description:
Before combat, rapidly increase your Focus as well as your damage and Crit chance.
Focus is required to use some bow skills and is lost if you move.

skill.name: Improved Quick Shot
skill.description:
Nock and loose an arrow quickly.
Has a chance to generate additional Focus.

skill.name: Improved Enlivening Grace
skill.description: Revives a defeated target, along with all Fellowship members nearby.

skill.name: Improved Song of Distraction
skill.description: A song that can make an enemy, and up to two other enemies within ten metres of the first, become drowsy and not detect players until they are much closer than normal. This does not work against monsters already engaged in combat.

skill.description: A pony from the Fall Festival.

skill.name: Autumnfest Horse
skill.description: A horse from the Fall Festival.

skill.description: A pony from the Yule Festival.

skill.name: Yule Festival Frosty Horse
skill.description: A horse from the Yule Festival.

skill.name: Commune with Nature
skill.description:
Summons a spirit companion.
The Spirit of Nature can greatly aid in restoring the Morale of your fellows.

skill.name: Mentor : Pibgorn
skill.description: You can instruct someone how to play the Pibgorn.

skill.name: Battle Preparation
skill.description: Allows the Warden to build Gambits before starting a fight.

skill.name: Yule Festival Snowy Pony
skill.description: A pony from the Yule Festival.

skill.name: Yule Festival Snowy Horse
skill.description: A horse from the Yule Festival.

skill.description: A ranged strike that deals heavy damage and is difficult to Block, Parry, or Evade.

A ranged strike with a chance to stun and interrupt the enemy.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Root replaced with a mount acceleration debuff</rgb>

skill.description:
A ranged strike that deals heavy damage and is difficult to Block, Parry, or Evade.
This skill applies an additional damage over time effect to the target.

skill.description:
A ranged strike that deals significant damage.
